overview: In the house he sleeps in, a boy see's a black casket his family refuses to explain. Instead of staying silent, the boy kept asking. overview: In 2142, seven neuroscience engineers are brought onboard the largest man-made spacecraft as part of a newly opened research division. When a containment breach places the station into quarantine, the walls of reality and humanity's future are in jeopardy.
title: the SPIRE.

overview: In Waiting for Magic, the isolated villagers of Taourirt prepare for the Muslim Conclave of the Nine—a secretive ritual held once a generation to commune with the Bean Sídhe (banshee), a spirit said to guard the island from ruin. The conclave’s purpose: to select a new Guardian who will bear the banshee’s curse, ensuring the village’s survival. But this year, eerie omens disrupt the ritual—a phantom wail echoes nightly, crops wither, and villagers vanish into the bog.
title: Waiting for Magic

overview: Four young women who launch a rebellion against the tyrannical Queen of the moon and soar through the stars while fighting to take charge of their own destinies.

overview: A group of troubled youths plot to murder the sadistic bully who has been ruining their lives.

overview: During a plague's reign of terror, a devout figure and an ambiguous stranger set out to trade supplies for an alleged cure in a nearby village, an odyssey which will take them deep into their own souls.

overview: Five People Wake up on various poles, and realise they need to play children's game 'the floor is lava' except, there's actual lava

overview: In the 18th Century, A slave, never given a last name, Marcellus is freed. But he has hasn't forgiven them for the years of dehumanizing and unpaid and unthanked service, but now he's freed he makes the most of life, but only for a year, when he realises his men are popping up, seemingly trying to kill him, but he tries to ignores them, but than they take his mother, and he goes back to kill them and save her
title: Marcellus

overview: Follow the early days of Dick Grayson and Jason Todd and explore how their friendship becomes tested by their diverging ideas for what their future should be.

overview: The seventh and final season of the popular Biblical television series, following Jesus' crucifixion and His Resurrection. It will be theatrically released in 2028.
title: The Chosen: Season 7 Premiere

overview: A globetrotting animated musical which follows a young adventurer as they journey the joys and heartaches, and the peaks and the valleys of life.

overview: After witnessing the murder of his own mother by his father's hands, Jester McCulley attempts to regain a sense of a normal life while battling with his inner desires and an unsettling past.
title: The Devil’s Disguise

overview: Alix decides to take a weekend getaway with her closest friends, but everything goes wrong when an accident occurs and she finds herself trapped in time, whenever she or her friends have any more close calls. As she tries to unravel the mystery of why time keeps going backwards, she’s forced to confront her and her friend’s own dark past and present. More bad luck falls on them each time they escape death. Will she find a way to save her friends and break the cycle? Or will it start to be too much for her to handle?
title: Destined for a Rewind

overview: A Superhero on the verge of his deepest darkest secret, the fact that he was a German solider in World War II, Eighty years previously being exposed scrambles to get the evidence eradicated as The Grandchild of a family who's lives were ended by the superhero tries to get the evidence out, as quick as possible, and a movie actress works as a spy to collect more evidence against the superhero
title: The Hero's Exposé

overview: A great actor, but terrible man with a struggling acting career finds hope and love, and his career takes off, he becomes a better person. A terrible actor but a great man sacrifices everything he cares about and all the morals he's ever sworn to uphold in the pursuit of greatness. But when the now great man with a great career takes all the parts he wants, he takes his career into his own hands
title: Split Screen

overview: A group of notorious criminals, all going by animal code names: leader 'Snake'; his friendly but bitterly incompetent brother 'Dog'; the brains, 'Lion'; third wheel 'Tiger'; sidekick 'Wolf'; and the violent 'Bear'. But one day, Tiger is killed by a simple gunshot. As the crew investigates, they discover one of their own may be a cop. As members are picked off one by one, the notorious crime group may finally be brought down by the law.
title: Inside Job

overview: A group of notorious criminals, made of six members, all going by animal code names. Leader 'Snake'  his friendly, but bitterly incompetent brother 'Dog', brains 'Lion', third wheel 'Tiger' side-kick 'Wolf' and overly violent 'Bear' but one day Tiger is killed with a simple gunshot. They dig around and find that one of their members is cop, and as more members are picked off, it seems like the notorious crime group may finally be bested by the cops

When he suddenly sees his long lost biological parents in one of his dreams, he journeys through his subconscious in an attempt to find them and potentially reconnect. However, throughout his journey, he crosses from his own dreamworld into an astral plane, of which he cannot return from.

overview: Aza, the hardened daughter of a crime lord, and Max, a disillusioned thief desperate to leave the business, are tasked with retrieving a mysterious item. As they navigate a world of mercenary soldiers, hidden agendas, and a looming shadow organization, their fractured past and lingering connection threaten to unravel.  Meanwhile, an agent known only as the Huntswoman fights to hold onto her mission—and her sanity—after a failed operation leaves her partner incapacitated. As the game of cat and mouse escalates, a severed hand, a locked safe, and a hallucinatory pink scarf become cryptic threads in a deadly web of intrigue.  Blurring the line between noir thriller and psychological horror, Cling Film is a haunting meditation on fate, guilt, and the choices that define who we are.
title: Cling Film

overview: Max Anderson (Tony Traylor) is your average city guy committing to his everyday life working at the Unruled Corporation. One day, not only does he meet a newcomer at the company, Michelle Jenkins (Rachel Lee), but he also accidentally stumbles into Ryan Collins (Gamebox), a person who acts and even dresses similarly to him. The two guys don't get along quite well, and as a result, they get tangled up in the middle of a very discretely secret propaganda led by the corporation's boss Jonathan Davis (RedRageKnight) as they end up lost far from home. Now, it is up for the two guys to find a way to get back to Crateville before it's too late.
title: Guys

He teams up with a group of people to try to find the person who stole the watch and fix time. Along the way, he discovers the past and has to come to terms with his life and relationships.

overview: Dorian Gray is but a boy, yet he's worshipped as a God - by the closeted painter who immortalized his beauty, by the libertine who taught him all of the world's secret pleasures, and by himself. For the next one hundred years, Dorian Gray falls into a rabbit-hole of debauchery, remaining forever young while his portrait pays the price for each of his sins. But when crimes of decades past come back to haunt him, and the novelty of everlasting youth starts taking its toll, can his soul still be redeemed?
title: Dorian Gray, or Narcissus Through the Looking Glass

overview: A year ago, a group of friends played a series of cruel pranks on an abandoned friend. After time passed, the dynamics within the friend group start to shift, and when tension arises, they decide to meet up for dinner at a restaurant. However, after their fun, they’re kidnapped and taken to an abandoned building, where they’re forced to encounter events that reflect the pranks and party from their past.

What began with whispers of revenge has erupted into all-out war, where alliances crumble and enemies strike from every side. In the chaos, old secrets resurface, forcing those who once fought from the shadows onto the battlefield.  With trust shattered and survival uncertain, revenge becomes the only compass — but in a war fueled by betrayal, who can you trust when the dust settles?  The battle has begun, but the truth is far from over.

overview: Michael Jackson, now a world-saving hero and musical icon, finds himself adrift after the chaos of the Spotlight Seven. Haunted by fame and fractured family ties, Michael embarks on a personal journey to reunite the Jackson Five—his brothers, his roots, and the harmony he lost. But the path to healing is far from simple. As old tensions resurface and new wounds emerge, Michael must navigate the complex legacy of his past while staying true to the joy that first ignited his voice.  Set against the backdrop of forgotten towns and abandoned recording studios, Michael reconnects with each of his brothers in a heartfelt odyssey across America. With Brad and Samantha by his side, and Goku occasionally crashing in with unsolicited wisdom, Michael learns that sometimes saving the world starts with saving your family.  Stripped of supervillains and secret councils, Michael discovers that history isn’t just what you’ve lived through—it’s what you choose to remember, reclaim, and rewrite in song.
title: Best Of Joy: Chapter 2 - History

overview: Alexandria Wright meets Elijah Martinez and the demonic journey begins. Elijah Martinez finds himself ensnared in a romantic involvement with Alexandria Wright, an unfaithful Covert Narcissist. She convinces him they are soulmates and they take a vow before God for His blessing with the penalty of betrayal being death. After years pass, Alexandria forgets the vows and begins cheating behind Elijah's back. Just a week before Christmas, she abruptly betrays him. To his astonishment, she swiftly transitions to a new relationship, bringing with her the unsettling secret of transmitting an incurable sexually transmitted disease to her new partner. Then came Karma. Her victims arrive to spit on her dirty grave as her demise finally arrives.
title: Duped (The Jezbel Experience)

overview: A teen that’s happy but later develops depression when he meets a gothic girl, due to realization that his life isn’t good at all. He realizes he has mental issues but the girl does too so she’s able to cheer him up, but even he knows he can’t be fully happy with her due to their different home lives. She tries her best to make him better as a person but as they get together, he makes the worst decisions due to him getting more involved in the wrong crowd. He’s so involved he even abandoned his one true friend. The only thing in his life that he does now is binge and restrict. Everything all about him is starting to fall completely apart.
title: As Everything Falls Apart

original_title: Three Bags Full: A Sheep Detective Movie
overview: George Hardy, a shepherd who loves his sheep and raises them only for their wool. Every night he reads aloud a murder mystery, pretending his sheep can understand, never suspecting that not only can they understand, but they argue for hours afterwards about whodunnit. When George is found dead under mysterious circumstances, the sheep realise at once that it was a murder and think they know everything about how to go about solving it. The local cop Tim Derry, on the other hand, has never solved a serious crime in his life, so the sheep conclude they will have to solve it themselves, even if it means leaving their meadow for the first time and facing the fact that the human world isn’t as simple as it appears in books.
title: Three Bags Full: A Sheep Detective Movie

As eerie events unfold, they realize someone is rewriting the genre—forcing them to fight for survival in a film that’s still being written. The only way out? Break the rules before it’s too late.

His mommy issues are tested when something happens to her, causing him to stay with his best friend. With his now close to perfect life, he tries his best to get his crush to fall in love with him.
title: Coming Out

overview: When New York architect Tate Donovan arrives in Cape Cod to design his best friend’s summer home, he is hoping to make a fresh start. Recently discharged from an upscale psychiatric facility where he was treated for acute depression, he is still wrestling with the pain of losing his beloved sister. Her deathbed revelation—that she can see spirits who are still tethered to the living world, a gift that runs in their family—sits uneasily with Tate, who struggles to believe in more than what reason can explain. But when he takes up residence at a historic bed-and-breakfast on the Cape, he encounters a beautiful young woman named Wren who will challenge every assumption he has about his logical and controlled world.
title: Remain

original_title: Chaos Kid: Random Acts of Awesome (and Oops!)
overview: Milo, a bright and imaginative kid, unintentionally turns everyday situations into hilarious chaos, from swapping salt and sugar at a bake sale to bubbling up the town fountain. But when his spontaneous release of rubber ducks threatens the annual Giant Vegetable Fair and Super Sparkle Fireworks Show, his chaos goes too far.  His sister, Lily, usually just annoyed, now sees his antics as a direct threat to her prize-winning zucchini. She decides to take matters into her own hands, hatching surprisingly "evil" (but kid-friendly) schemes to keep him out of trouble.  With the help of his quirky best friend and a surprisingly understanding adult, Milo must untangle the mess he's created and outsmart Lily's attempts to "help." In doing so, he discovers that even the most chaotic moments can lead to extraordinary solutions and ultimately bring siblings closer.
title: Chaos Kid: Random Acts of Awesome (and Oops!)

overview: An adaptation of Homer's epic poem of the same name, follow Odysseus in his perilous journey home after the Trojan War, showcasing his encounters with Polyphemus, the Sirens, Circe, and finishing with his reunion with his wife, Penelope.
title: The Odyssey

overview: Feature film directed by Hamza Pool, currently in post-production, style and plot kept under wraps.
title: Better Days

overview: Bagman is targeted by a supervillain named “the coner” and is the subject of his many crimes being told that each day he does not reveal his identity one co-op is exploded. bagman has to either defeat the coner or lose his identity
title: BAGMAN-THE BLUE BEAST

overview: A disillusioned ex-soldier, Wyatt Kane, retreats into the woods, only to class with a team of State Police protecting a corrupt logging company. As tensions rise, Kane uncovers a conspiracy that forces him to fight for justice- no matter the cost.
title: Trigger

overview: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by Maui reaches the island of an impetuous Chieftain, his willful daughter answers the Ocean's call to seek out the demigod to set things right.
title: Moana

overview: When a young boy carving his way from slavery to freedom. he face challenges that will shape his future personality and decisions.
title: Vinland

overview: Plot TBA. Will center around a shark attack.
title: Shiver

overview: A typical rom-com with an atypical rom-com ending, I Swiped the Wrong One is the story of four thirtysomethings who attempt to navigate the world of 21st century online dating.
title: I Swiped the Wrong One

overview: The third installment in the Minions spin-off series, and the seventh film overall in the Despicable Me franchise.
title: Minions 3

overview: The upcoming movie from Frameatic Studios.
title: Valkryie

overview: While Superman was sent to Earth and raised by incredibly loving parents, Kara was left on Krypton. For the first fourteen years of her life, Kara lived alone on a piece of Krypton that drifted away from the planet.
title: Supergirl

overview: Buzz, Woody, Jessie and the rest of the gang's jobs get exponentially harder when they go head to head with an all-new threat to playtime: tech.
title: Toy Story 5

overview: A UFO story. Plot TBA.
title: The Dish

overview: The sixth entry in the horror spoof series. Details TBA.
title: Scary Movie

overview: A North Korean girl escapes her country to start a new life in France. However, things don't go as expected. She is mentally sick.
title: Verra

original_title: IronSight Pictures' HERONICS: Part 3 - The Rise Of The Indestructable Void
overview: The sequel to HERONICS: Part 1  and 2. The World is more destructed and a new Villain, VOIDMAN is rose to destroy all.
title: IronSight Pictures' HERONICS: Part 3 - The Rise Of The Indestructable Void

overview: Almost two decades after crashing down to Earth, Prince Adam is whisked back across space to defend his home planet of Eternia against the evil forces of Skeletor. But to defeat such a powerful villain, Prince Adam will first need to uncover the mysteries of his past and become He-Man: the most powerful man in the Universe.
title: Masters of the Universe

overview: Indy and Finn are best friends who escape into the forest to create a fantasy film filled with heroes, monsters, and wooden swords. As they immerse themselves in their imaginary world, the real world quietly encroaches, Finn is moving away, and neither boy knows how to say goodbye.  Their playful filmmaking project becomes a means of clinging to a fleeting connection. Through toy knights, hand-drawn monsters, and whispered arguments, the boys wrestle with the inevitable changes that come with growing up.
title: Finn

overview: Redmond, who was raised intensely Catholic, struggles to cope with the loss of his religion  throughout different stages of life, constantly seeking penitential fire through masochistic means.
title: To Wander the Earth

overview: As Riley trying to have a great summer, upon killers killing her friends that get in there way. She stumbles trying her best to survive.
title: Slasher Summer

overview: The movie follows an unnamed internet hitman who, after one of his previous victims comes back to life, locks himself in his bathroom with a gun with one bullet to get away from the corpse that is outside his bathroom door that is banging on the door trying to get in! As time goes by he slowly starts going insane and starts talking to himself in one sided conversation while having weird dreams that seem to predict the future, he receives dog food and phone calls from a strange man with unexplained knowledge about everything named Mr. E, who discusses topics of morality, philosophy, and mysterious, all-powerful them, while asking to be let into the house!
title: The Hinge

overview: Montana 1998. The lives of a wide kaleidoscope of characters intertwine in a dramatic fashion as the romance between Clara-Belle and Rebecca tightens.
title: Missoula

overview: Andrew Vengeance is determined to stop the MIC from attacking their city and knows they need a strong team to counter the CIA's threat.
title: Vengeance Rising

overview: Santiago Muñez, now a seasoned football manager, takes on a high-profile role at a top European club, where the star player is Mambinho, his Brazilian half-brother. Mambinho, who rose to stardom through viral social media videos showcasing his incredible skills and connection to Santiago, is now a key figure in the team. Despite knowing of Mambinho's presence, managing him proves to be an emotional challenge as they navigate a strained relationship and the pressure of maintaining success on the pitch.
title: Goal IV: Dreams Never End

overview: Cabinet (2026)  Genre: Mystery, Thriller, Science Fiction  In a shadowy, bureaucratic organization known only as The Workplace, recruits are subjected to a ritual of initiation involving a mysterious cabinet—an anomaly that assigns them a partner whose identity is inexplicably implanted into their minds. The process, shrouded in secrecy, is designed to minimize accidents in the field. But when one recruit lingers inside for an unprecedented 48 seconds, seasoned agent Alice begins to question everything she thought she understood about her job.  As Alice and her new recruit navigate a world of hidden threats, underground dealings, and inexplicable phenomena, a desperate search leads Alice to confront the limits of knowledge, safety, and certainty.  Blending existential horror with a noir-infused investigative thriller, Cabinet is a chilling descent into the boundaries of reality and the cost of uncovering hidden truths.
title: Cabinet

overview: The Mandalorian, a lone bounty hunter, is tasked with capturing Grogu, a mysterious and adorable creature. Instead, he forms a strong bond with Grogu and strives to protect him from various threats, exploring his evolving purpose in a post-Empire galaxy.
title: The Mandalorian and Grogu

overview: Struggling writer Lowen Ashleigh is on the brink of financial ruin when she accepts the job offer of a lifetime: she's been hired to complete the remaining books in a successful series that bestselling thriller author Verity Crawford is unable to finish after a mysterious accident. Upon arrival at the lavish Crawford estate, Ashleigh slowly learns that things are not exactly as they seem.
title: Verity

overview: Jake Bishop has been an exemplary Executive Protection Medic with a distinguished career but life hasn't always been that way for him. There have been miscues, failures, wrong turns and one day he just decides to walk away from it all. His ex boss wants to hire him for one final mission together and when Jake senses redemption for all life's twist and turns, will they survive and can the thought of love save him just in time from a path of destruction. Only time will tell.
title: A Guardian's Heart

overview: In this incredible show of the human spirit, we follow a hopeless software developer down in the debts. They now have do go into the seedy underground of the city to find funds and answers.
title: Forbidden 404!

overview: Tyler Edward's first feature film. A Horror/Sci-Fi that follows journalist Nicki Quinn as she documents a married couple’s monumental extra-terrestrial science experiment.
title: Captive

overview: Eight-year-old Bela lives in a home strained by her parents’ troubled marriage, only to see her life further upended by a sinister entity she calls “Other Mommy.” When this malevolent presence emerges from her closet, persistently asking, “Can I go inside your heart?” Bela refuses. But soon, Other Mommy’s manifestations become increasingly aggressive, threatening the safety of Bela’s family.
title: Incidents Around the House

overview: After her parents' death, Lily moves into the vacation home they left for her and discovers she's far from alone.
title: Little Lamb

overview: A suburban housewife embarks on a dangerous mission to rescue her captured husband so he isn't late for dinner.
title: Taco Tuesday

overview: This dark comedy follows Jamie Van Hamm as he clings to his once great superhero franchise. In a last-ditch effort to save face, Jamie recruits a Make A Wish kid as the star of his penultimate movie.
title: A Hill to Die On

overview: A reformed heroin addict turned Christian man believes that his fiancé is having an affair with the head pastor of his new church. Seeking to unfold the mystery, he learns that the church is harboring a much darker secret that will challenge his new faith and bring back old wounds from the past.
title: A Sinful People

overview: A terminally ill teenager calls upon his best friend to help him escape captivity for one final good night out.
title: The Surge

overview: After a historic fall from grace, a legendary boxing coach hides his losing battle with cancer as he tries to restore his recently discharged prodigy, but he realizes his involvement may be more harmful than good for both parties.
title: Icarus

overview: After a local woman is murdered and martyrized for being queer, a lesbian couple discusses their own fears.
title: Sculpture

overview: A student researching sleep paralysis slips into a lucid nightmare.
title: shuteye

overview: Miranda's career goes into decline, forcing her to go face-to-face with Emily, now a major executive at a luxury group, whose advertising dollars Miranda desperately needs.
title: The Devil Wears Prada 2

overview: Two animals become unlikely friends.
title: Animal Friends

overview: Jack and Olivia marry and move from London to Sorrento, Italy, the couple’s new life begins to unravel as tensions lead to addictions and temptations. Family secrets are revealed, and the couple must accept that their lives will never be the same.
title: Don't Call Me Columbo

overview: After the death of his fiance, Cara, Wyatt, an emotionally explosive young man, struggles to cope with his grief and growing resentment for his reserved friend and roommate, Matt, who’s struggling with demons of his own. While Wyatt wallows in his self-loathing at the burial, he is approached by the cryptic Mysterious Man. Who offers him friendship and a chance to bring Cara back through a ritual. As tensions between Wyatt and Matt escalate, and his knowledge of the ritual expands. Wyatt learns the dark cost of what the ritual entails…
title: UNTIL NEXT TIME

overview: Plot TBA. Described as breathing modern life into ageless evil.
title: Lee Cronin's The Mummy

overview: A comedic music take on the classic Grimm’s fairytale.
title: Hansel and Gretel

overview: Plot TBA.
title: Italianna

original_title: Ready or Not: Here I Come
overview: The sequel to the 2019 film. Plot TBA.
title: Ready or Not: Here I Come

overview: A new movie based on the world of Super Mario Bros. that further broadens Mario's world with a bright and fun story. Plot TBA.
title: Super Mario World

overview: In 2015, Roman Catholic priest Rob Galea joined the Australian version of The X Factor but, due to his holy duties, had to withdraw. But this didn't stop him from becoming a widely beloved contemporary Christian singer-songwriter.
title: The Singing Priest

overview: In the wake of a traumatic incident at a funeral, an aging widow is faced with a bizarre, impossible choice.
title: Resurrection

overview: In Indiana, a group of pro-life terrorist lure vulnerable young women into a trap. Which one will escape? Which one will be blessed?
title: Blessed: Live, Laugh,Run!

overview: Soon after the Thompson family’s arrival in the countryside, the three children – Beth, Joe, and Fran – discover a magical tree and its extraordinary and eccentric residents, including Moonface, Silky, Dame Washalot, and Saucepan Man. At the top of the tree, they are transported to spectacular and fantastical lands and, through the joys and challenges of their adventures, the Thompsons learn to reconnect and value each other for the first time in years.
title: The Magic Faraway Tree

overview: A short drama film.
title: Green Time

overview: After the world's population has been ravaged by a pandemic, a man lives a lonesome existence in a Colorado airplane hangar with his dog and a dour gunman he has befriended. When a mysterious transmission comes through on the radio while he’s flying his old Cessna, it sparks a hunt for the provenance of the sound.
title: The Dog Stars

overview: A scorned student uses AI to spread a rumor about their ex-situationship, leading to unintended consequences.
title: SPECIOUS

original_title: Untitled Trey Parker / Matt Stone / Kendrick Lamar Comedy
overview: A young black man interning as a slave re-enactor at a living history museum discovers that his white girlfriend’s ancestors once owned his.
title: Untitled Trey Parker / Matt Stone / Kendrick Lamar Comedy

overview: A lone astronaut wakes up on a spaceship with no memory of his mission. As he pieces together his past, he discovers he's humanity's last hope against an extinction-level threat, leading to an unexpected yet crucial alliance.
title: Project Hail Mary

overview: Glimmer, an aspiring performance artist, debuts her one woman show: "Glimmer - One Last Shine!" However, something about this show isn't quite right as her audience is forced to watch as Glimmer's sanity slowly unravels.
title: Glimmer

overview: Nate’s supermom wife, Katie, lands a deal on Shark Tank. Subsequently, the lifelong breadwinner of the family becomes a stay-at-home dad and quickly realizes he’s in way over his head.
title: The Breadwinner

overview: A family in the '80s start to notice bizarre happenings in their neighborhood.
title: Flowervale Street
